title: DevTinder
description: A full-stack MERN web application that connects developers by enabling profile creation, authentication, and real-time interactions. Implemented secure login with Google OAuth and JWT-based authentication, role-based access, and REST APIs for user connections. Designed a responsive UI with React and Redux, ensuring seamless state management and smooth user experience.

title: Portfolio
description: This is my personal portfolio which showcases my skills and achievements dynamically.It have a responsive features which adjusts and works according to screens.

title: Hall Management Center(HMC)
description: It is an dynamic website which can be used by universities to manage student accomodations.

title: TO-DO
description: This is a project designed to manage day to day works.It assists the users to efficiently manage their tasks.
